'''Heart of Unity''' is [[Kachina]]'s [[Night Realm's Gift Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Phlogiston consumption only occurs when Kachina is mounting Turbo Twirly.
* As a member of the [[Children of Echoes]], Kachina can perform the following actions like the [[Tepetlisaurus]]:
** [[Climbing]] walls and solid [[Phlogiston]].
** Entering [[Molten Fissure]].
** Solving [[Tutorial/Buried...|buried]] puzzles.
